text: The 1912 Geneva Covenanters football team represented the Geneva College during the 1912 college football season. The head coach was Graydon Long coaching the team in his first year. The team finished the season with a final record of 3–4. ==Schedule== ==References== Geneva Category:Geneva Golden Tornadoes football seasons Geneva Covenanters football
title: 1912 Geneva Covenanters football team
